user_query: the starch thank you yes and now we're gonna attempt to finish it in 28. 00 I'm sorry who are you my name is Rich Purnell I work in astrodynamics and you should hang up the phone I know how to save Mark Watney tell them what you just told me I can get the Hermes back to Mars by Sol 561. and right now the Hermes is headed towards Earth starting its month-long deceleration to intercept but instead you start accelerating immediately to preserve velocity and gain even more we don't intercept with Earth at all but we come close enough to get a gravity assist and adjust course while we're doing that we resupply with the Taiyang Shen pick up whatever Provisions we need and now we're accelerating towards Mars now we're going too fast at this point to fall into orbit but we can do a flyby what use is a flyby if we can't get Watney off the surface Watney would intercept using the MAV oh I've done the math it checks out is he right yep Bruce what do you think well if Vincent says so but what about the Hermes crew we'd be asking them to add 533 extra days to their mission yeah they wouldn't hesitate for a second can the Hermes function for 533 days beyond the scheduled mission it was built to last the full Aries 5 Mission so technically it's only halfway through its lifespan but if something goes wrong then we lose the crew so what we either have a high chance of killing one person or a low chance of killing six people um we still have a chance to bring five astronauts home safe and

entities.entity_description: Rich Purnell은 천체역학(astrodynamics) 부서에서 일하는 인물로, Mark Watney를 구출할 방법을 발견한다
Mark Watney는 화성에 고립되어 구출이 필요한 우주비행사이다
Hermes는 지구로 귀환 중인 우주선으로, 화성으로 다시 돌아가 Watney를 구출할 수 있는 가능성이 있다
Vincent는 Rich Purnell의 계산을 검증하는 인물이다
Bruce는 구출 계획에 대해 의견을 제시하는 인물이다
Taiyang Shen은 Hermes에 보급품을 제공할 수 있는 우주선이다
The Martian은 화성에 고립된 우주비행사의 생존과 구출을 다룬 SF 영화이다

relationships.relationship_description: Rich Purnell이 Mark Watney를 구출할 수 있는 방법을 발견했다
Rich Purnell은 The Martian에 등장하는 천체역학자 캐릭터이다
Mark Watney는 The Martian의 주인공으로 화성에 고립된 우주비행사이다
Hermes 우주선이 화성으로 돌아가 Mark Watney를 구출할 계획이다
Taiyang Shen이 Hermes에 보급품을 제공할 예정이다
Vincent가 Rich Purnell의 계산이 맞다고 확인해준다
Bruce는 Vincent의 의견을 신뢰하여 계획을 검토한다
